mapper.select: SELECT q.*, u.user_name FROM qna q INNER JOIN users u ON q.user_seq = u.user_seq WHERE q.qna_id BETWEEN #{startPage} AND #{endPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna (qna_title, qna_content, qna_date, qna_password, user_seq) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, CURDATE(), #{userPassword}, #{userSeq})
